title: 我的世界闪退
author: hen_xianyu
txt_content:
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x0000000073ce252b, pid=9136, tid=0x0000000000000504
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_111-b14) (build 1.8.0_111-b14)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.111-b14 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  0x0000000073ce252b
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# C:\Users\hen_xianyu\AppData\Local\SogouExplorer\.minecraft\hs_err_pid9136.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed  这种情况，之前还好好的

replies.author: 我爱魁拔
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 我爱魁拔 于 2019-3-23 17:17 编辑 

An error report file with more information is saved as:
# C:\Users\hen_xianyu\AppData\Local\SogouExplorer\.minecraft\hs_err_pid9136.log。。这个发下看看
一般来说常见解决方法有1.内存调大或调小 比如 512 1024 1500 2048 2300 
                                       2.更换64位java                        
                                       3.更换启动器 比如hmcl（论坛里有）
                                       4.将客服端mod全部复制 然后放到另外一个新的客服端中（可以排除mod的问题）
                                       5.更新forge

replies.author: hen_xianyu
replies.txt_content:

umm，现在才看到，虽然已经解决了，但还是给个最佳吧...
